verses.roman:
prabhu āsi' jagannātha daraśana kaila
'mahāprabhu āilā'--grāme kolāhala haila

synonyms: prabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; āsi'-returning; jagannātha—to Lord Jagannātha; daraśana—visit; kaila—made; mahāprabhu āilā—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu has come back; grāme—in the town; kolāhala haila—there was great agitation.
translation: When Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu arrived in Jagannātha Purī, He visited the temple of the Lord. News then spread all over the city that He had returned.
